text: waqalat alyahud lammat muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm: adkhuluu fi din alyahudiat tajiduu alhdayt, waqalat alnasaraa lahum mathal dhalik. qul lahum -ayha alrswl-: bal alhdayt 'ana ntbe- jmyeana- milat 'ibrahym, aldhy mal ean kl din batl 'iilaa din alhq, wama kan min almushrikin biallah teala
